nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace

The Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace is a sticker book that was published by Dorling Kindersley and released on January 16, 2012. The book included over 1,000 stickers in celebration of the 3-D re-release of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.

Star Wars fans of all ages can learn more about their favorite The Phantom Menace characters, creatures, vehicles and events. Featuring more than 1,000 bright, full-color stickers of your favorite Episode I characters like Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker, Queen Amidala, Darth Maul, and Jar Jar Binks, alongside interesting movie facts, Star Wars: The Phantom Menace Sticker Collection will allow for hours of sticky interstellar fun!
